alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Lyon; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 1:17AM EDT until May 09 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Christian County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Caldwell County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Trigg County in western Kentucky... Southern Lyon County in western Kentucky... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1217 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Princeton to 7 miles northeast of Woodlands Nature Station to near Cravens Bay Campground, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Princeton, Cadiz, Hillman Ferry Campground, Cravens Bay Campground, Land Between The Lakes Area, Cobb, Rockcastle and Hawkins. This includes Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 47 and 70. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Paducah.
